summary: Frontend testing completed for 3 refactoring tasks: ListingsGrid extraction, require cycle fix, and shimmer loading. All features working correctly with no require cycle warnings.

homepage_loads_correctly_with_listings_g.notes: Homepage loads with 4-column grid on desktop, 2-column on mobile. ListingsGrid component renders correctly with listings.

desktop_header_renders_correctly.notes: Logo, Sign In/Up buttons, Post Listing button, search bar, location selector all visible and functional.

desktop_category_pills.notes: All category pills visible: All, Auto & Vehicles, Properties, Electronics, Phones & Tablets, Home & Furniture, Fashion & Beauty, Jobs & Services, etc.

mobile_header_renders_correctly.notes: Mobile header shows logo, notification bell, location selector, search input, circular category icons, and Recent Listings section.

category_selection_filters_correctly.notes: Clicking Electronics navigates to /category/electronics. Clicking Properties navigates to /category/properties.

sellers_page_with_shimmer_loading.notes: BusinessDirectorySkeleton displays during loading with shimmer effect. Page loads correctly showing business cards after loading.

no_require_cycle_warnings.notes: MobileHeader.tsx now uses direct imports instead of barrel file imports. No require cycle warnings in console logs.

listings_grid_columns_based_on_viewport.notes: Desktop shows 4 columns with 20 items displayed. Mobile shows 2 columns.

critical_code_review_comments: ListingsGrid component correctly extracted with data-testid attributes
MobileHeader require cycle fixed by using direct imports instead of barrel file
BusinessDirectorySkeleton properly integrated in sellers page for shimmer loading
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 tasks completed successfully: 1) ListingsGrid extracted from index.tsx (657 lines), 2) Require cycle fixed in MobileHeader by changing to direct imports, 3) Shimmer loading added to sellers page using BusinessDirectorySkeleton. No issues found.
